title: Adverb collection 3
sentences: That is completely fine with me.
We usually meet on Friday evening.
It is about ten kilometers to the city.
My brother is just as tall as I am.
I have already called three times.
Are you still in the office?
I have only been here for an hour.
I have to go shopping beforehand.
We can talk about it afterwards.
He is certainly coming to your party.
We will see each other again soon.
Do you have enough money for the ticket?
That is really a good idea.
I am often walking in the park.
We rarely eat in a restaurant.
I will never forget what you said.
The pharmacy is very close to me.
I am tired, nevertheless I must work.
I am hungry, so I am cooking something.
dictionary:
kaum - hardly / barely
völlig - completely
meistens - mostly / usually
beinahe - almost
etwa - about / approximately
genauso - just as / equally
schon - already
noch - still
erst - only / first
jetzt - now
vorher - before / beforehand
nachher - after / afterwards
sicher - certainly / surely
leider - unfortunately
bald - soon
genug - enough
wirklich - really
oft - often
selten - rarely
nie - never
immer - always
weit - far / wide
nah - near / close
trotzdem - nevertheless / anyway
also - so / therefore
